# Welcome {.unnumbered}

This website hosts the materials for the workshop *"Using Digital Footprint Data to Understand Population Movement"*. The course was designed and is delivered by Prof. Francisco Rowe.

The website is *free to use* and is licensed under the [Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivatives 4.0 International](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/).
